dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: What brings you to this city?

dialogues.speaker: Stranger
dialogues.text: I'm just passing through. What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I'm looking for a place to stay. Do you know any good inns around here?

dialogues.speaker: Stranger
dialogues.text: Actually, I was just there yesterday. The Black Dragon Inn has a great reputation.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Thank you for the tip! I'll go check it out.
